improvement_list.improvement_desc: Potential division by zero error.  The value of y can become 0 inside the loop if x is odd.  Add a check to avoid division by zero before line 10.
The loop always runs 49 times. The variable x will always become negative.  Consider adding a check or modifying the loop condition.
Unnecessary computation in the loop; x is decremented unconditionally, then checked for even/odd.  This does not affect the final result, and so can be optimized.
